website_summaries.verdict: These high performing Nike soccer cleats feature a leather, synthetic sole, with a waterproof k-leather upper with mesh backing.
pros: Premium leather makes these cleats very durable
cons: They run small – definitely order up

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but order up a size or 2
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but had to order a few sizes up. Feet measures at 7 and originally ordered a size 8. But the 8 was too small. Ordered a 9 and that fit is good.
customer_reviews.author: K. N.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Tiempo
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on older model. Fits like all Tiempo cleats. Not for broad feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: So happy I did
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly! I am a size 6 in women's but after reading previous reviews, I order a 6 1/2 since it was said it ran small. So happy I did, because it fit perfectly. It came in handy for flag football season. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them they fit perfect she will always go with a leather shoes over synthetic
customer_reviews.author: garland hillyer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were too small and vendor charged me a 20 % "restocking fee" to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these shoes for my daughter 1/2-size up form ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my daughter 1/2-size up from her current size as her next pair of shoes. Given she already has a pair of Tiempo Legend V in a smaller size, they fit as expected. She likes the softness of the kangaroo leather versus synthetic or calf-leather shoes, as it gives more stretch. EDIT: She likes these shoes so much, I bought another pair a full-size up so she can grow into those, too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, wayyy too small
customer_reviews.text: Shoe seems fine but the size is off by 1-1/2 sizes; see photos. The two nikes in photo are both size 7, made in Vietnam. You can see how short the yellow one is. The second photo is Adidas 5-1/2 cleats for my younger daughter. Same size and she said the adidas weren't as tight.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoe but runs small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful, but they are WAY TOO SMALL! We even measured my daughter's foot to ensure that we ordered the correct size. Bummer.....
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, bright and durable, is holding up really well
customer_reviews.text: Colors are very bright, shoes are very durable and stood up to quite a bit of abuse so far!
customer_reviews.author: SmellsLikeScamSpirit

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful upper leather cleats
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful upper leather cleats! Please make sure to go up 1/2 size than normal and it should work out. Comfortable. I'll need a few days to break them in, so I suggest practicing in them before a real game or use thicker socks/moleskin for the first couple times. Check out the other reviews on Amazon for this cleat, they were helpful to me. Repeat, COMFORTABLE :) Satisfied customer :) Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tulip

customer_reviews.title: although I think they will probably fit better after I break in the cleat a bit more
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a size 6.5 and I ordered a size 7.5. They still feel very snug, although I think they will probably fit better after I break in the cleat a bit more. Overall, these are a great, classic fit football boot. If you're not looking for anything too fancy in terms of technology on your cleat this is a good shoe for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a half size larger than usual and they were still too small in length. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: russomel

customer_reviews.title: Teimpos are my favorite kind of cleat
customer_reviews.text: Teimpos are my favorite kind of cleat. They always have a great feel to them and so i bought them for my girlfriend as a birthday present. She said they feel great but her only complaint is they are smaller than expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NIKE Womens Tiempo Legend V FG Soccer Cleat Blue Lagoon/Volt
